Name: Jamaican Mule
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Copper mug or Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lime slice and mint sprigs.
Fill glass two-thirds full with cubed ice.
TOP with ginger beer and fill glass with a crown of crushed ice.
Garnish with lime slice and mint sprigs bouquet.
Review: A spicy rum lime sour, lengthened and invigorated with ginger beer.
Nutrition: One serving of Jamaican Mule contains 179 calories
